summary: CONSUMER CALLED COMPLAINING ABOUT A CAR SEAT EVENFLO MODEL # 2093M9P1 MANUFACTURE DATE JUNE,14 2002. CONSUMER ALSO STATED THAT THE CAR SEAT WILL NOT SEAT ON A 45 DEGREE ANGLE WHICH WILL NOT ALLOW THE CAR SEAT TO STAND CORRECTLY. MANUFACTURE WAS CONTACTED AND HAS SUGGESTED THE CONSUMER TO ROLL A TOWEL AND PUT IT UNDERNEATH THE CAR SEAT SO IT CAN SIT FINE WHICH CONSUMER DOES NOT AGREE TO BE SAFE. TS
